moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bb5 Nge7: An uncommon variation of the Ruy Lopez
moves.6. c3 b5 7. Bc2: Bc2 instead of Bb3 because of ... Na5, followed by c5
moves.14. Nxa3 Na7 15. e5: It's been 15 moves and Black still hasn't castled. The kingside is horribly under-developed. Perhaps h6 was a mouse-slip and black intended g6 followed by Bg7.

gameName: What happens when you don't castle in the opening
